name: Spark Defense
storyline:
Introducing the ultimate MOBA defense - an intense adventure of strategy and skill! Choose from two heroes and try to survive all of the action-packed waves. Multiplayer coming in May 2023!

Play as Frosteya, the archer, or mix it up with Turn'Up if you like to fight up close and personal. Tailor your defensive layout to your playstyle and your chosen hero. Build out your bunker and play defense or fight alongside your turrets to defend the Harvester. Upgrade your towers and walls to survive the final waves. Keep the Harvester functional to keep those upgrades coming!
summary: Spark Defense is a high-stakes hero-driven, multiplayer MOBA defense game that lets you play your way. Go on the defense, play it boldly, or mix it up. Keep your hero alive and your harvester running. Mine sparkite and emerge a champion!
